activities: EQOD, LLC performs  a range of business, document and data process outsourcing services for clients. These services may result in the collection of personal data from the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EQOD's privacy policy provides that claims which cannot be resolved through EQOD's internal process will be settled by arbitration administered through the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program).
